ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a comprehensive tutorial for learning assembly language programming on AMD64/Intel 64-bit architectures. It covers fundamental concepts like registers, instruction sets, memory management, and assembler directives. The tutorial is aimed at novices and beginners, providing practical examples and explanations to help them understand low-level programming.
